text: Linda Manz (August 20, 1961 â€“ August 14, 2020) was an American actress. She was active from 1978 to 1997. She was best known for her roles in Days of Heaven (1978), Out of the Blue (1980), and Gummo (1997). Manz was born in New York City. Manz died on August 14, 2020 from pneumonia caused by lung cancer in New York City at the age of 58. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1961 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Cancer deaths in New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from New York City
title: Linda Manz
